title: AI Resume Parser
description: Built a resume parser using NLP to extract skills, experience, education, and contact details from PDF and DOCX resumes. Used Python, SpaCy, and regex to clean and structure data. Achieved 92% accuracy on entity extraction.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Created a responsive portfolio website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Integrated a contact form with email notifications and deployed on GitHub Pages. Improved page load time by 35% using optimized assets.

title: Sales Data Dashboard
description: Built a sales dashboard using Python and Streamlit to visualize sales trends, KPIs, and forecasts. Integrated charts, filters, and downloadable reports. Reduced manual reporting time by 50% for sales team.

title: Chatbot using LangChain
description: Built a chatbot with LangChain and local LLM. Implemented document search using ChromaDB and created a conversational interface with memory. Used this chatbot to answer FAQs from company documents.

title: Customer Support Automation
description: Developed a ticket classification system using machine learning to route support tickets to the correct team. Achieved 87% accuracy and reduced response time by 40%. Integrated with Slack notifications.

title: E-commerce Recommendation Engine
description: Built a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and content-based filtering to suggest products to users. Improved click-through rate by 18% and sales conversion by 12%.

title: Twitter Sentiment Analyzer
description: Created a sentiment analysis tool that analyzes tweets for brand sentiment using NLP. Used Tweepy to fetch tweets and visualized sentiment trends using Plotly.

title: Financial Forecasting Model
description: Built a financial forecasting model using time series analysis (ARIMA) to predict monthly revenue. Improved forecast accuracy and generated reports for management review.

title: Image Classifier
description: Built an image classification model using CNNs in TensorFlow to classify 10 categories of images. Achieved 91% accuracy on test dataset and deployed model using Flask.

title: Automation Script for Excel
description: Built automation scripts to clean and process large Excel datasets using Python. Reduced manual data cleaning time by 70% and automated report generation for weekly meetings.

title: IoT Smart Home System
description: Developed an IoT-based smart home system using Raspberry Pi and sensors. Built a dashboard to monitor temperature and control devices remotely. Integrated MQTT for communication.

title: AI-Based Job Recommendation
description: Created a job recommendation system using NLP to match candidate profiles with job descriptions. Used embeddings and cosine similarity to rank best-fit jobs.
